title: Unique vintage garden-style apartment near UCLA. Westwood
posting_body: Unique 1 Bedroom 1 Bath Apartment in Westwood Near UCLA!
Westwood Garden is a timeless, 8-unit apartment community located in Westwood, Los Angeles.
We offer charming 1 and 2 bedroom floor plans designed with your needs in mind.
This unique vintage garden-style apartment reminiscent of true Westwood living in the very best location near UCLA.

This very spacious and renovated 1-bedroom 1-bath apartment has large picture windows, kitchen has all stainless steel appliances including gas stove and oven, dishwasher, microwave, and refrigerator with generous granite countertops and updated maple cabinetry.
Separate dining room area opens to a sizeable living room with rich wood flooring and fire place, the bedroom has generous closet space, windows, and ceiling fans.
Bedroom includes in-wall air conditioning and has walk-in closets.
Bathroom has granite countertops and updated cabinetry with shower/tub combo.
You have a closed garage for sizeable storage needs as well as tandem parking behind it which allows for that most-needed commodity in Westwood -- parking.
Nestled North of Wilshire Blvd., you are in close proximity to UCLA, UCLA Medical Center, and Century City.
Treat yourself to everyday conveniences immediately outside your front door like Whole Foods, Ralphs, Target, Trader Joe’s, and the weekly Farmers Market.
This is a one-of-a-kind apartment for someone who wants both character and quality in their apartment.
For appointment to see this apartment or for questions, call
Disclaimer: Pictures are a representation but may not be of the exact apartment.
Advertised unit availability, rental rates, and terms are updated every 24 hours and conditions are subject to change without notice.
Please call for latest availability details.
